name: SAFE - Ghana Version (Private Equity)
description: Simple Agreement for Future Equity (SAFE) localized for the Ghanaian tech ecosystem, focusing on common seed-stage investment terms in Accra.

clauses.clause_text: THIS SAFE (Simple Agreement for Future Equity) is made on {{agreement_date}} between {{company_name}} ('the Company') and {{investor_name}} ('the Investor').

In exchange for the payment by the Investor of a purchase amount of {{purchase_amount}} (GHS) (the 'Purchase Amount'), the Company issues to the Investor the right to certain shares of the Company's capital stock.

If there is an Equity Financing before the expiration or termination of this SAFE, the Company will automatically issue a number of shares to the Investor equal to the Purchase Amount divided by the conversion price.
The Valuation Cap for the purpose of conversion is {{valuation_cap}} (GHS). The Discount Rate is {{discount_rate}}%.
In the event of a Liquidity Event or Dissolution Event, the Investor will be entitled to receive a cash payment equal to the Purchase Amount, prior to any distribution to holders of Common Shares.
The Company warrants that the issuance of shares upon conversion of this SAFE shall comply with the share issuance procedures of the Ghana Companies Act, 2019 (Act 992).
